Chapter 1862 - The Lost Treasures Of Spiritual Desolation Mountain

The bronze palace’s interior was spacious and largely empty.

Sixteen massive bronze pillars stood in a staggered row, supporting the ceiling. All of them were completely covered in the secret markings of the Divine Dao. The markings were lit up, and a calamitous aura filled the air.

An old man in a Daoist priest’s cap sat cross-legged before the furthest pillar, holding a revolving black jade disc.

Streaks of the power of Annihilation shot from the black jade disc, continuously surging into the sixteen bronze pillars. The mysterious markings carved on their surfaces were gradually melting and disappearing.

Bang!

A figure slammed to the ground and rolled, shrieking like a slaughtered pig. He was a powerfully built man with a martial bearing and imperial robes, but now, he was covered in blood and utterly wretched.

The old man with the black jade disc was stunned. He looked at the entryway and saw a young man in blue robes sauntering over.
